descript.abstract: Colombia Social Census Data 2018 is a polygon theme representing Manzanas (6th level administrative units) in Colombia as of 2018. Attribute information includes official population and housing data for Colombia from the 2018 census. This census is provided at the manzana administrative level (ADM6) and includes 349,708 polygons with 1,013 attribute variables. Attribute descriptions retain Spanish-language names and unique identifier codes. All variable names were translated from the Source language (Spanish). Field name prefixes, originally written with coded titles, were renamed to create unique names across the geodatabase (e.g. Original variable of "Total Personas" was updated to D001 and given the alias "Total Number Of People [Total Personas]", the letter D was given as it relates to the Demographic theme table. D = Demographic, E = Economic, H = Housing, M = Migration and S = Social). All variables from the original data were reviewed for completeness and organized into their relevant themes of Demographic, Economic, Housing, Migration and Social. The geodatabase was built to hold these specific tables with all geographic names and codes represented as text fields and census data represented as doubles or long integers. Automated tools were run to apply aliases in the format "English translation field description[Spanish language field description]". Vector data was analyzed for accuracy and compared with national boundaries.
descript.purpose: This dataset provides population statistics for Colombia, with correlating administrative boundaries in vector format, for use in GIS software.
